@Feargal_Sharkey Back to the bad old 60s/70s when heavy industry discharge to rivers was common. As a keen schoolboy coarse fisherman in the 70s, I saw the price paid by freshwater fish. #backtothefuture with regular sewage discharge and farm runoff @EnvAgency? Wild swimming @trishgreenhalgh?
